resources.string: Cleanpress will give your clothes a second chance to surprise you.
Make that suit or dress shine again with our dry cleaning plans.
Wash and fold will no longer be a problem for you, leave it to us.
Cleanpress can help you save those extra dollars and give you and your family more time to spend together.

With 24-hour turnaround, green cleaning, pre-sunrise through late night availability, and a cookie at every pick up, Cleanpress is the easiest, tastiest, and most convenient dry cleaning & laundry option around.
CleanPress is the cheapest, fastest and most convenient laundry & dry cleaning option in South Florida. You submit your order and we will clean the rest.

With 24-hour turnaround, green cleaning, pre-sunrise through late night availability, and a cookie at every pick up, Cleanpress is the easiest, tastiest, and most convenient dry cleaning & laundry option around.
